label: Use Matching by OpenSubtitleHash (Matches against file OSHASH)
Use Filename for search, will ignore the current title assigned in Plex

Regex to remove from filepath.  For example: '\[.*?\]' would remove everything between brackets in the filename.  Multiple terms can be separated by commas, and terms are case insensitive. Also remember that a space is a valid character, so don't put them after commas unless you mean to.  ` - ,\(.*?\),\[.*?\]` (without quotes) will remove '<SPACE>-<SPACE>', THEN everything in (), THEN everything in []
Cleanup S##E## naming, or try to.  Will rewrite S##E## as S##:E## instead for better matching
